name: Swallow the Sun (CameronOtten)
description:
You are the Ouroborus, the Great Devourer of Worlds. You hunger for death is insatiable, but with this death comes new life. This delicate balance is unyielding. The fractal structure will go on forever and you are given the tool to keep it in motion. 

This game is an explorative, meditative, and chill experience and despite the dark undertones of destroying worlds, there is a feeling a calmness and hope. I hope you enjoy.

Creator: Cameron Otten
